mainBoard.flavorText:
"I dedicate my body to my country And my life to my King."
—Alaborn Soldier's Oath
mainBoard.name: Alaborn Trooper

foreignData.name: Engel der Gnade
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Engel der Gnade aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, erhältst Du 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

mainBoard.name: Angel of Mercy
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy comes into play from your hand, you gain 3 life.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters, you gain 3 life.

mainBoard.flavorText:
Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it.
—Elvish saying
mainBoard.name: Bear Cub

mainBoard.flavorText: The elvish scout was scrupulous about the truth. She told the traders that gold lay nearby.
mainBoard.name: Golden Bear

foreignData.name: Krächzender Sceada
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Krächzende Sceada aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte und wähle dann eine Karte aus Deiner Hand und wirf diese ab.

mainBoard.name: Screeching Drake
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Screeching Drake comes into play from your hand, draw a card, then choose and discard a card from your hand.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Screeching Drake enters, draw a card, then discard a card.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Their ships pollute our air as they themselves pollute our forest."
—Arathel, elvish queen
mainBoard.name: Talas Air Ship

foreignData.name: Erforscher der Talas
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Erforscher der Talas aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, schaue Dir die Karten auf der Hand Deines Gegners an.

mainBoard.name: Talas Explorer
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Talas Explorer comes into play from your hand, look at your opponent's hand.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Talas Explorer enters, look at target opponent's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: The trader let loose a laugh that made all around him check their purses.
mainBoard.name: Talas Merchant

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Scouting a battle before you fight it is just good business."
—Jefan, Talas ship captain
mainBoard.name: Talas Scout

mainBoard.flavorText: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

foreignData.name: Tempelnovize
foreignData.text: Wenn der Tempelnovize aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, erhältst Du 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

mainBoard.name: Temple Acolyte
mainBoard.originalText: When Temple Acolyte comes into play from your hand, you gain 3 life.
mainBoard.text: When Temple Acolyte enters, you gain 3 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Battle tempers soldiers as fire tempers steel.

foreignData.name: トローキンの上級近衛兵

mainBoard.name: Trokin High Guard

mainBoard.flavorText: People fight hardest on their own soil.
mainBoard.name: Volunteer Militia

mainBoard.flavorText: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.
mainBoard.name: Wild Griffin

mainBoard.flavorText:
Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin.
—Alaborn saying

foreignData.name: Hornissenstich
foreignData.text: Der Hornissenstich fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Bee Sting
mainBoard.originalText: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to any one creature or player.
mainBoard.text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old."
—Former soldier

foreignData.name: Pfad der Gewaltlosigkeit
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl. Der Besitzer dieser Kreatur erhält 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.

mainBoard.name: Path of Peace
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy any one creature. That creature's owner gains 4 life.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Path of Peace tries to resolve, the spell doesn't resolve. No player gains life.

You are a creature's owner if the card representing it began the game in your deck, or if it's a token that entered the battlefield under your control. If Path of Peace targets a creature that you own but an opponent controls, you'll gain 4 life.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: "First they fight, then they sleep, then they dream. And finally I receive my reward."

foreignData.name: Traumraub
foreignData.text: Ziehe für jede getappte Kreatur, die Dein Gegner im Spiel hat eine Karte.

mainBoard.name: Theft of Dreams
mainBoard.originalText: For each tapped creature your opponent has in play, you draw a card.
mainBoard.text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The ogre had come from out of the blue, so that's where I sent it back."
—Talas wizard

foreignData.name: Zeitebbe
foreignData.text: Lege eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl aus dem Spiel zurück oben auf die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers.

mainBoard.name: Time Ebb
mainBoard.originalText: Return any one creature from play to the top of its owner's library.
mainBoard.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
